search_general_talk_swsh_2021/4401_0701_: I can’t believe my own Charizard would get lost...
search_general_talk_swsh_2021/4402_0701_:
There were two balls of fire floating in the air!
I bet it was a pair of ghosts...of a parent and
its child!
search_general_talk_swsh_2021/4403_0701_:
People and Pokémon both meet as a result of
losing their way...
search_general_talk_swsh_2021/4404_0701_: Champion Leon?! Wow, you’re the real thing!

B-but there’s no time to think about that right
now! My Charmander went missing!

I also need to find my Charizard. Why don’t we
search for them together?
search_general_talk_swsh_2021/4405_0701_:
Charizard! So you found that lost Charmander and
brought it back safely!

You’re amazing, Leon! You’re the reason why I
teamed up with my Charmander as a sync pair!

We’re gonna get a lot stronger! So the next time
we meet, please...could you maybe...
Sure! Let’s have a Pokémon battle then!
Charizard and I will be waiting for your challenge!
search_general_talk_swsh_2021/4406_0701_:
We’ve gotta cheer those kids on!
[Name:PlayerNickname ], feel that flow!
search_general_talk_swsh_2021/4408_0701_: I know you can keep the beat going!
search_general_talk_swsh_2021/4409_0701_: You got everyone’s cheers backing you!
search_general_talk_swsh_2021/4410_0701_:
Thanks for cheering me on! I really felt all that
energy you were sending!
My cheers will really get you going!

Sometimes it’s nice to take a break from battling
to team up and cheer for other people.
